DataElement.preferredName: Disposition Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset Qualifier Data Value Stratum Group Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A subset or defined set of attributes of a cohort.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disposition Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset Qualifier Data Value Stratum Group
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the disposition domain._The value of the data modifier._A designation used to segregate study subjects into collections in order to balance the study for analysis. The stratum group is made up of a combination of stratification criterion answers, which ultimately is used to assign study subjects to arms on a study.

Concepts.definition: The value of the data modifier.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PMI CDISC Harmonization
ReferenceDocuments.description: This will be managed as an "enumerated by reference CDE" (i.e., list of values will be managed outside of the caDSR, as a dynamic searchlist in Rave, etc.).
